snippet: Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi said Wednesday that the suspended talks could resume after Iran’s new president, Hassan Rowhani, takes office early next month.
abstract: Iran's Foreign Min Ali Akbar Salehi says country is prepared to resume suspended talks on its disputed nuclear program with six big world powers after Iran’s new president, Hassan Rowhani, takes office in Aug 2013.
lead_paragraph: Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi said Wednesday that the suspended talks could resume after Iran’s new president, Hassan Rowhani, takes office early next month.

headline.main: Nuclear Program Talks Could Resume, Iranian Official Says
headline.print_headline: Iran: Nuclear Program Talks Could Resume, Official Says
